channel.title: Release
channel.description: Rsce is the only server that's online that people play because there is no other, now is the best time to host it you will get a lot of players I'm guessing.

item.title: Release
item.dc:creator: @shadyltd shadyltd
item.description:
@shadyltd wrote:

I’m tired of servers like RSCE now honestly. After playing for years and watching the economy become more and more fucked up.

Rather have a PKing server to play on once in awhile honestly. Was surprised to come back after quitting RS for a few years to find hardly any servers up anymore lol. Wish I could get my old StorkPK server up just for fun lol

Read full topic

item.title: Release
item.dc:creator: @peroxides peroxides
item.description:
@peroxides wrote:

The server didn’t die because I spawned some items, it was fate and n0m who got unmotivated and were too inactive to keep the server up-to-date with bug fixes etc…

Read full topic

item.title: Release
item.dc:creator: @xx_matty_xx Justin Bieber
item.description:
@xx_matty_xx wrote:

[quote=“peroxides, post:6, topic:541645”]It looks like a fun server to play? I have never talked with rodgerwilco about anything nor have I been given the offer to receive any items…

Why do you keep posting shit that I helped anyone from codexrsc? Who are you anyways?
I have never once helped them do anything at codex. I have already admitted I spawned items at rscr, who gives a fudge, the server was going downhill anyways. I was the only active one there for the last 3 months before it shutdown. Had the other staff stayed active, that server may still have been up and I wouldn’t have done what I did.[/quote]I spoke to rodgerwilco about this on multiple occasions and he seems to be of the belief that codexrsc hasn’t changed anything, and that it’s operated by a bunch of out-of-touch idiots. I think you’re being pretty bold admitting that you spawned items on rscr though… it had a flourishing economy and you kids went and ruined it by spawning everything. You could have at least been subtle about it?! I don’t think you can justify that sort of behaviour at all.

Read full topic

item.title: Release
item.dc:creator: @peroxides peroxides
item.description:
@peroxides wrote:

It looks like a fun server to play? I have never talked with rodgerwilco about anything nor have I been given the offer to receive any items…

Why do you keep posting shit that I helped anyone from codexrsc? Who are you anyways?
I have never once helped them do anything at codex. I have already admitted I spawned items at rscr, who gives a fuck, the server was going downhill anyways. I was the only active one there for the last 3 months before it shutdown. Had the other staff stayed active, that server may still have been up and I wouldn’t have done what I did.

Read full topic

item.title: Release
item.dc:creator: @iBoss iBoss
item.description:
@iBoss wrote:

[quote=“peroxides, post:3, topic:541645”]honestly who cares about hosting a rsc replica, those servers always fail… there are people that always ddos or don’t want to fudge around with 1xp… seriously I cbf with 1xp that’s way too low and would take vast amounts of my time.

If you want a fun productive server look at Karajma.net

This server has some potential if they can keep progressing with updates and get more players for each faction.

I’ve tried all of these 1xp servers and they just don’t work…

No One has the time to put forth the effort… You won’t see me there anyways…

A custom server is what needs to come forth and I see great potential in Karajma.net[/quote]

What did they offer you so you root for them now? Let you bot? Items? Items for server funds? Knowing how shady are the staff there and your previous actions.

Read full topic

item.title: Release
item.dc:creator: @KizL KizL
item.description:
@KizL wrote:

X1 server is the only way to play rsc. Everything else is just lame. Id rather have ::setstat then high exp rates.

X1 or everything is free and stats can be set. Anything else is a waste of time.

~K!zL

Read full topic

item.title: Release
item.dc:creator: @peroxides peroxides
item.description:
@peroxides wrote:

honestly who cares about hosting a rsc replica, those servers always fail… there are people that always ddos or don’t want to fuck around with 1xp… seriously I cbf with 1xp that’s way too low and would take vast amounts of my time.

If you want a fun productive server look at Karajma.net

This server has some potential if they can keep progressing with updates and get more players for each faction.

I’ve tried all of these 1xp servers and they just don’t work…

No One has the time to put forth the effort… You won’t see me there anyways…

A custom server is what needs to come forth and I see great potential in Karajma.net

Read full topic
